name: Blizzard (ScoreSpace)
description:
Greetings! This is an entry for ScoreSpace #23

In blizzard you must collect the necessary survival items in 60 seconds, before the blizzard arrives.

I would consider this more of a prototype than a fully finished game

(Un)known issues:

- slightly cursed highscore board (its the gms2 default since I am not experienced with this engine)

- whatever else you may find

Missing Features

Mostly features that I am thinking of adding post launch.

- Cutscenes

- A more clear tutorial

- More environmental details

- Other fixes / bugs / QoL that may come up (including the actual need for the checklist since its pointless rn, thanks for pointing that out, Didnt realise in the rush of things :). )

Virustotal scan:

original

https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/948eebab50d3a1327db82ca6f9e048398d20cdf1686e...

room-fix

https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/351b87c635afb5514cc2f3732d280ef47ef7f662c42e...

All assets are made by me. Apart from the music and wind sfx which are taken from https://opengameart.org 

(All under CC0 public domain collection)

The notepad/timer/scoreboard font is not mine either, but it's marked as "free for commercial use" under 1001 fonts.
